title: The Forest 0.31b
description:
*******************************************************************************
                          The Forest (0.31b)
*******************************************************************************

As the lone survivor of a passenger jet crash, you find yourself in a mysterious forest battling to stay alive against a society of cannibalistic mutants. 

Build, explore, survive in this terrifying first person survival horror simulator.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                         General informations
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Game type: Simulation, Action, Adventure, Horror
Language: English
Creators: Endnight Games Ltd
Size: 793 MB
Year: 2016
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                         Minimum configuration
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
OS: Windows 7/8/10
CPU: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHZ
Ram: 4 GB
GPU: NVIDIA GeForce 8800GT or better
DirectX: Version 9.0
Hard Drive: 5 GB
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                       Recommended configuration
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
OS: Windows 7/8.1/10
CPU: Quad Core Processor
Ram: 4 GB
GPU: GeForce GTX 560 or better
DirectX: Version 9.0
Hard Drive: 5 GB
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                            Installation
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Just simply run the installation program (The Forest Setup.exe), 
install the game and play.

Enjoy!
